responseText: I need someone to go there, to that lost forge. Confirm its state, yes, but more importantly, search every cooled hearth, every dusty shelf, for Varnok's writings. His final, unfinished masterwork was said to be there too, a testament to his ambition! Will you undertake this? For the future of dwarven smithing? For my apprentice Valen?
name: ANV_FTUE_HR_Bindur_8_Response
